title._content: [Third Lieutenant John Alphonso Beall of Company D, 14th Texas Cavalry Regiment, with Spencer carbine] (LOC)

description._content: [Third Lieutenant John Alphonso Beall of Company D, 14th Texas Cavalry Regiment, with Spencer carbine] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 9.3 x 8.1 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Rinhart, no. 211. Additional information in collections file. Photograph shows identified soldier. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Purchased from: The Historical Shop, Metairie, La., 2011. Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Published in: A photographic history of Texas in the Civil War / Carl Moneyhon and Bobby Roberts. Fayetteville : University of Arkansas Press, 1998, p. 135. Subjects: Beall, John Alphonso,--Military service. Confederate States of America.--Army--Texas Cavalry Regiment, 14th.--Company D--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Confederate--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. Rifles--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.32059 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2767
